rdf:Description.dc:description: One CD-ROM issued in pocket of module 1.
Teacher's guide catalogued separately with textbook.

Module 1. Measurement -- module 2. Number patterns in tables -- module 3. Relations and functions -- module 4. Sampling -- module 5. Line segments -- module 6. Linear functions -- module 7. Trigonometry.
Approved for use in Alberta schools.
